    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • isValid

      public static boolean isValid(long number)
      (@author Robert Beauchamp:
      Parameters:
      number - (is a user long input (the credit card number))
      Returns:
      This returns a true or false response to the main method. Non main methods are fed into this method to determine whether or not the card number is valid.

    • sumOfDoubleEvenPlace

      public static int sumOfDoubleEvenPlace(long number)
      Parameters:
      number - (is a user long input (the credit card number))
      Returns:
      (returns the sum of every other digit(2, 4, 6, etc) from right to left, multiplied by 2)

    • getDigit

      public static int getDigit(int number)
      Parameters:
      number - (is a user long input (the credit card number))
      Returns:
      (If a digit from method 'sumOfDoubleEvenPlace' is greater than ten the number's digits are added together and fed into method 'sumOdDoubleEvenPlace'.)

    • sumOfOddPlace

      public static int sumOfOddPlace(long number)
      Parameters:
      number - (is a user long input (the credit card number))
      Returns:
      (This method returns the sum of the odd placed numbers (1,3,5,7 etc) from right to left.)

    • prefixMatched

      public static boolean prefixMatched(long number, int d)
      Parameters:
      number - (is a user long input (the credit card number))
      d - (holds the number of digits in number)
      Returns:
      returns true if the prefix matches 4, 5, 6, or 37 the only valid card prefixes.

    • getSize

      public static int getSize(long d)
      Parameters:
      d - (is used to hold the number of total number of digits)
      Returns:
      (returns the size of the credit card number, passes into 'prefixMatched' as well as 'isValid' and 'getPrefix')

    • getPrefix

      public static long getPrefix(long number, int k)
      Parameters:
      number - (is a user long input (the credit card number))
      k - (defines the result in a for loop)
      Returns:
      returns a long to be passed into 'prefixMatched' to define the prefix.
